backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and order management with storage, ID info, and payment contact workflows.
backend/old.mo: Legacy types and structures defining older versions of orders, profiles, and canister state layout.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three principal‑ID UI features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file for build and documentation reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Detailed deployment guide explaining how to deploy the backend canister and host the React frontend on cPanel.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based style file defining color tokens, dark mode values, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Optional Apache config enabling compression, caching, security headers, and MIME rules for the static frontend.
frontend/public/DEPLOYMENT.md: Frontend‑only deployment guide for hosting the built React app on cPanel and connecting it to the IC backend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling hash-based routing, authentication state, admin checks, and profile gating.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Wrapper component enforcing admin access with states for login, loading, errors, and restoration.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentCon: Admin form for updating payment/contact status and notes with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity auth and manages related query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredScr: UI screen prompting unauthenticated users to log in before placing orders.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalIdFoote: Displays the authenticated user's principal ID with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx: Canvas-based signature input component with drawing, clearing, and data URL export.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides a hook that checks if the authenticated caller is an admin using react-query with proper loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRestore.ts: Defines a mutation that restores admin access for the caller and invalidates related admin and profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRole.ts: Ensures the authenticated user has the user role by invalidating and refetching related caches once per principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, logout, identity loading, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Contains hooks for submitting, fetching, and updating orders using actor methods with react-query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile with appropriate query invalidation and admin refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileGate.ts: Determines if an authenticated user must complete profile setup based on identity and profile fetch state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, typography rules, and global layout constraints.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by rendering React with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin page that loads a specific order, displays details including ID photos/signatures, and allows updating payment contact status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin dashboard listing all orders with filters, search, stats, and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with hero banner, about section, and navigation buttons for ordering and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders, handles authentication checks, and shows either a list of orders or detailed order view with statuses.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows confirmation details for a submitted order and automatically opens a payment-info modal.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Provides a full order form with validation, file uploads, identity data, and submission logic requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PricesPage.tsx: Shows pricing information, feature highlights, and sample tier cards with an option to navigate to the order page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile, checks admin access, and supports restoring admin privileges.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Utilities to generate base-path-safe URLs for static assets and documents.
frontend/src/utils/errorFormatting.ts: Functions to extract human-readable error messages and redact sensitive data, plus IC-specific backend error extraction.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Client-side image file validation and conversion utilities.
frontend/src/utils/idGenerators.ts: Local random generators for names and US-style addresses.
frontend/src/utils/orderFormatting.ts: Formatting helpers for order dates and readable status labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and cleaning URL parameters across routing modes.
frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts: Static list of US states for dropdown selection.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, existing features, and a new in‑progress request related to temporarily displaying a user’s principal ID.
